title: Plagiarism Check Tool Issue
description: A faculty member is trying to use the plagiarism detection tool (e.g., Turnitin) integrated with the LMS, but it's not generating a report.

tasks.description: Identify the faculty member, course, and assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the context of the issue.

tasks.description: Check the assignment settings in the LMS to ensure the plagiarism tool was enabled correctly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the settings are correct.

tasks.description: Manually re-sync the assignment with the plagiarism detection service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent forces a refresh of the connection, which successfully generates the report.
